title: Standard deviation is a measure of how much

content.question: Dr. Wundt gave his students an exam on the functions of different parts of the brain, and the average score was an 85. However, when Dr. Wundt calculated the standard deviation, it was a value of 35.2. This concerns Dr. Wundt because he knows that standard deviation is a measure of how much

choices.label: two sets of scores vary together
difference there is between the highest and the lowest score in a sample
scores in a group differ from the mean of that group
scores from a sample differ from that of the population

content.answer: scores in a group differ from the mean of that group

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
